title: Unable to override `quarkus.http.port` with a `config/application.properties` file
body:
Hello,
following the doc here https://quarkus.io/guides/config-reference#application-properties-file I would like to provide an application.properties file to override `quarkus.http.port` property.
I have tried different ways:

* created config/application.properties in the target Maven folder and run application with mvn quarkus:dev
* tried the above but with config/application.properties under target/classes
* create config/application.properties in target/quarkus-app and started my application with java -jar

All of them with no luck. The configuration is ignored.
What's the mistake I am making? Thanks!
